doc.after: There is debate over the security of free software in comparison to proprietary software with a major issue being security through obscurity A popular quantitative test in computer security is to use relative counting of known unpatched security flaws Generally users of this method advise avoiding products that lack fixes for known security flaws at least until a fix is available
